lyrics: Simona You're getting older your journey's been Etched on your skin Simona I guess I know her We seemed so strong We've been there and gone I will call you up everyday Saturday night And we both stayed out 'til the morning light And we sang, "Here we go again" And though time goes by In a club with you It was 1973 singing "Here we go again" Simona Wish I was sober So I could see clearly now The rain has gone Simona I guess it's over My memory plays our tune The same old song and though time goes by In a club with you It was 1973
